title: Analyze Rails Routes Configuration
description: Review Rails routes configuration and summarize external interfaces
prompt: Please review the config/routes.rb and summarize all the external interfaces for the application.
example:
This will analyze routes.rb to show:
- All API endpoints
- External service integrations
- Public web routes
- Mounted engines/applications
author: GooseAI Team

file_path.description: Path to the Rails routes configuration file
